description:
** This game plays much better if you hold the phone upright **
The demo version is limited to 40 points.
Shape Sorter is a unique game for the Pre & Pixi that will challenge your dexterity and mind.
In Shape Sorter the object of the game is to line up shapes (holes) on your sphere with incoming, floating shapes (blocks). Once the block gets to the hole, you score a point. If you get the wrong hole you lose a life. The better you've lined up the shape, the faster the shape will fall, allowing you to move on to the next incoming shape.
Rotate the phone to play, lay the phone flat to pause.
